name: Ram Destroyers
description:
Game Description

Oh no... 

You accidentally clicked on the wrong button on a site and ended up downloading malware instead of the space-shooter game you always wanted. 

Now you must deal with popups blocking your sight of enemy aliens as you play your new space game. 

To make things worse the malware has somehow affected part of the game making it so that your shooting can get worse!

The Ram Destroyers team and their roles:

Kayli Coulthard - project manager and lead UI designer - 

Marko Kuper - lead programmer

Nathaniel Hachey (Myself) - lead artist

Achita Paiyarat - lead audio artist

Joseph Arruda - lead game designer

Kameron Pearson - lead narrative artist
